channel.title: Comments on: Friday Go Forward: Week 54

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Thanks! I definitely will be doing my best to jot down all my adventures and take lots of pictures so that I have a lot to write about when I get back! I'm really glad that my review on the first jubango game helped! I know that it's not necessarily the most advanced, but I'm glad it got you started on understanding the game. =)
item.content:encoded:
Thanks! I definitely will be doing my best to jot down all my adventures and take lots of pictures so that I have a lot to write about when I get back!
I’m really glad that my review on the first jubango game helped! I know that it’s not necessarily the most advanced, but I’m glad it got you started on understanding the game. =)

item.title: By: Eyecatcher
item.dc:creator: Eyecatcher
item.description: Ps: just checked Lizardfish's GO Notes --- why not pdf?! it kind of brings you more to the point were you use a real Goban to replay this "notes" ... good idea... will check on that regularly.
item.content:encoded:
Ps: just checked
Lizardfish’s GO Notes — why not pdf?! it kind of brings you more to the point were you use a real Goban to replay this “notes” … good idea… will check on that regularly.

item.title: By: Eyecatcher
item.dc:creator: Eyecatcher
item.description: So have a great time in Hong Kong! I`m looking forward to see some games and read storys about what you have been expirencing there :) And we still should review our game together... maybe after your trip ;-) By the way, started to read your review of the first jubango game lee - gu ... helped me a lot to understand the game, thnx for that.
item.content:encoded:
So have a great time in Hong Kong! I`m looking forward to see some games and read storys about what you have been expirencing there ðŸ™‚
